summary: Internal FBI email correspondence forwarding a contact list of Epstein victims from a Victim Outreach Strategist to a Program Manager in the FBI Victim Services Division for review and distribution.

events.title: Review of Victim Contact List
events.description: A Program Manager in the FBI Victim Services Division is asked to review and approve a contact list of Epstein victims for distribution.
personsInvolved: Program Manager FBI Victim Services Division

keyFacts: The FBI Victim Services Division was actively managing a contact list of victims related to the Jeffrey Epstein case as of July 2020.
Internal communication shows coordination between a Victim Outreach Strategist and a Program Manager regarding victim outreach efforts.
An attached file named 'contact_list_only_31E-NY-3027571_6.26.2020.xlsx' suggests a structured list of victims was maintained, referencing a specific case number (31E-NY-3027571).
